particleLexeme: 1. Used in a sentence (immediately next to a verb, or at the beginning or end of the sentence) to mean that the action happens every first week or every first unit of time which has already been established (day, month, semester, year, etc.).
nominalLexeme: 1. Each and every week which is the first week in a cycle (usually of four weeks or a month), or each and every unit of time which is the second unit in a cycle.
